summary:
I am an ERP specialist and am surprisingly good in what I do. Because of the diversity in my projects I  have knowledge of procurement, finance, HR, logistics, customer service, sales, manufacturing and BI. 

My personal mission is to be unique and to help and challenge others with my knowledge. My passion is to push myself and others outside their comfort zone.

I am an enthusiastic person with a strong drive. Also I am structured, have strong analytical skills and I am persistent. My positive attitude, social and sincere character and high dose of creativity makes me often a tower of strength for my team.

certifications.name: Unit4 Business World Procure to Pay
Oracle Procurement Cloud 2016 Certified Implementation Specialist
Oracle Fusion Procurement 11g Certified Implementation Specialist
Oracle Fusion Financials 11g Accounts Payable Certified Implementation Specialist
Oracle E-Business Suite 12 Financial Management Certified Implementation Specialist: Oracle Payables

projects.title: KPN IT NL - VAT21-ZEUS
projects.description:
The Dutch parliament has announced that by October 1, 2012 in the Netherlands, the standard VAT rate will be increased from 19 to 21%.

KPN has asked Capgemini to set up a project to design, build, test and implement the consequences of the VAT rate increase to Oracle EBS R12 (ZEUS).

Jeroen was in his role as functional consultant responsible for to help during a phase of the project to help with the design, build, test and implementation of the VAT rate increase.

projects.title: Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons - Unit4 Business World On! implementation
projects.description:
The Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons (OPCW) is the executive body of the Chemical Weapons Convention (Chemical Weapons Convention, abbreviation CWC). The task of OPCW is to destroy all chemical weapons worldwide and to monitor the chemical industry in order to prevent new weapon creation. OPCW is currently implementing a new ERP solution based on the Unit4 Business World On! Software.

Jeroen is part of the implementation team and in his role as P2P Unit4 Business World On! Consultant partly responsible for the stream P2P.

projects.title: Amsterdam UMC - Research future business application
projects.description:
In June 2018 AMC and VUmc started an alliance together under the new name Amsterdam UMC. However, the future business applications have not yet been determined. It is therefore not yet possible to make decisions about future business applications and follow-up steps to be taken. The question for Capgemini is, together with AMC-VUmc, to elaborate possible future scenarios for the business applications of Amsterdam UMC, including transition path (multi-year roadmap) and follow-up steps to realize the desired situation.

Jeroen carries out this research together with two other colleagues. This is done by conducting interviews with the various directors, drawing up scenarios and a conference. Jeroen is involved because of his expertise in the ERP field.

projects.title: Nuffic - Unit4 Business World On! Support
projects.description:
For its organization, Nuffic is replacing its current financial applications with an integrated and standard system. The software is implemented in three platforms, first the head office, then the worldwide NESO offices and finally the interface with the HRM package. 

Because of his broad Unit4 Business World On! experience Jeroen was asked to support, just before the first Go Live, the current implementation team. Jeroen provides support for all processes at Nuffic during the aftercare phase. 
He helps to solve problems and improvements and supports the implementation of the next phases. In addition, he is engaged in the development of new requirements and wishes for optimizing the current implementation.

projects.title: Veiligheidsregio Flevoland - Contract management implementation
projects.description:
Veiligheidsregio Flevoland wants to implement the module contract management within Unit4 Business World On!. With this implementation, they want to achieve a number of things, such as increasing the percentage of orders within a contract, being able to better track the exploitation of the contracts and gain more insight into the details of contracts. In addition, the main goal is to create awareness of the ownership of a contract and simplify the ordering process through the use of contracts.

Jeroen is in his role as Unit4 Business World On! lead consultant responsible for the entire implementation of this module.

Together with his team he implemented the complete solution and trained all users.
Veiligheidsregio Flevoland has successfully gone live with this new module.

projects.title: Veiligheidsregio Haaglanden - Unit4 Business World On! Support
projects.description:
Veiligheidsregio Haaglanden has implemented a new financial system. After the implementation, Veiligheidsregio Haaglanden still needed temporary support to tackle various maintenance and specific issues. 
Jeroen has been responsible for the support of Unit4 Business World On! in his role as UBW consultant. 
Veiligheidsregio Haaglanden is supported in this way in order to be able to use the system in a more efficient way.

projects.title: Veiligheidsregio Haaglanden - Unit4 Business World On! implementation
projects.description:
Veiligheidsregio Haaglanden intends to implement a new financial system. The reason for this is that the current financial system no longer meets the wishes of the Veiligheidsregio Haaglanden, because the creation and modification of reports and forms is only possible to a limited extent and because the current setup and structure no longer meet the information needs of Veiligheidsregio Haaglanden. For this reason, Veiligheidsregio Haaglanden has decided to implement Unit4 Business World On!.

Jeroen is partly responsible for the implementation of Unit4 Business World On! in his role as Unit4 Business World On! consultant. Together with his team he implemented the complete solution and trained all users.

Veiligheidsregio Haaglanden has successfully gone live in a short time by, among other things, using the VR template that has worked as an accelerator.

projects.title: Veiligheidsregio Limburg Noord en Midden - Unit4 Business World On! implementation
projects.description:
Veiligheidregio Limburg-Noord wants to have better management information available for both internal control and external accountability. In addition, they want to support the processes for planning and budgeting, commitment control, purchasing, sales and finance with a new system to achieve better transaction recording and insight into the financial-economic position of the organization. Finally, they want to improve the quality and efficiency of registering and managing the financial transactions. To achieve this, they have decided to implement Unit4 Business World On!.

Jeroen is partly responsible for the implementation of Unit4 Business World On! in his role as Unit4 Business World On! consultant. Together with his team he implemented the complete solution and trained all users.

Veiligheidregio Limburg-Noord has successfully gone live in a short time by, among other things, using the VR template that has worked as an accelerator.

projects.title: Capgemini Group - Global Oracle Procurement implementation
projects.description:
Capgemini wants to implement a new global procurement system to reduce the complexity of the processes, to globally implement a common set of tools and processes and to make more use of the Oracle EBS 12.2.5 functionalities by integrating financial and procurement processes into one system. 
This will reduce the number of dependencies and interfaces to other systems and it enables further cost reduction, industrialization & simplification.

Jeroen is in his role as Oracle S2P Solution lead responsible for the Oracle S2P solution.
The global design phase is succesfully delivered and the project is handed over to IT for execution.

projects.title: Capgemini Group - Oracle Procurement Cloud
projects.description:
Capgemini wants to implement a new global procurement solution for Sourcing and Supplier management to reduce the complexity of the processes, to globally implement a common set of tools and processes and have a solution that could be implemented in a short timeframe in order to support the urgent business need. 

Jeroen is in his role as Oracle Procurement Cloud expert responsible for the Oracle cloud implementation. Together with his team he has implemented the complete solution and trained all business users.

The project has successfully gone live. The biggest win with this project is that in a very short timeframe and minimum cost it was possible to realize a global solution that is fully standard, scalable and simple and easy to use that meets the business needs. 

One of the benefits of Cloud is that implementation timelines are shorter, which was really demonstrated through this project. Both sourcing and supplier management were implemented in three months. The testing phase was completed in two weeks and the move to production in one day.

projects.title: PPG Europe B.V. - Oracle R12 EMEA Project
projects.description:
PPG Industries is one of the leading company in paints, coatings, optical products, specialty materials, chemicals, glass, and fiberglass. Currently they are using a highly customized Oracle 11i environment for all their major business functions. They plan to modernize their application landscape by uplifting from Oracle 11i to R12 and adopt the standard Functionalities of R12 as much as possible to reduce customizations.

The complete project is highly complex and has a wide geographical, technical and functional scope, which for instance involves the roll-out to 16 countries within Europe where PPG is located. 
Jeroen was in his role as stream lead responsible for the Purchase to Pay stream within the project. He is the overall responsible for the functional implementation of the complete Purchase to Pay stream.

In February 2015 the first part has successfully gone live and in February 2016 the second part.

projects.title: Global Retailer - Oracle Fusion Procurement Cloud prestudy
projects.description:
This global retailer has the ambition to replace the current applications for Sourcing, Contract Management and Supplier Management in line with grow strategy with Purchasing, e.g. the need to support the new Purchasing organization with better tools.

They have asked Capgemini to support the ongoing pre study. Capgemini will help to validate and refine the To Be processes, the requirements and the functional fit for Oracle Fusion Procurement Cloud, to support the development of a POC, to draft an implementation plan and to conclude the overall fit of the solution. 

Besides that Capgemini will also do an Information model analysis involving data model comparison between current business systems and Oracle Fusion Procurement Cloud.

Jeroen is part of the core team doing this pre-study, located in Sweden. Jeroen was in his role as Oracle Solution Architect the overall responsible for the functional Oracle aspect in the pre-study and involved in all activities. 

The team has delivered the end report to the client concluding on the fit for Oracle Procurement Cloud. This was received as a very satisfying result which really helps them forward in the journey of making decisions whether to go for the Oracle Procurement Cloud.

projects.title: BZK - Rijksgebouwendienst - ENF R12 Releases
projects.description:
The Government Buildings Agency (RGD) had implemented a new Oracle eBS R12 platform in the beginning of 2013 with the project ‘een nieuw fundament’ (ENF) to maintain all their buildings, (rental) contracts, projects, maintenance and financial administration.

After the Go live the RGD decided to do some more enhancements on their R12 EBS instance during 2013 with the goal to realize 80 changes before the end of the year. Capgemini did not do the implementation project but has now been asked to gain knowledge of the implementation and perform the releases for the RGD.

Jeroen was in his role as lead Oracle ERP application responsible for delivering the current releases on time and within budget for the RGD, the knowledge transfer to Capgemini and the orchestration of the complete change process with Capgemini. Jeroen is leading the Capgemini team which does the design, build, test and implementation for the several release items. 

His team has successfully implemented a number of changes within time and budget and with a satisfying result according to the RGD.

projects.title: Lend Lease - Oracle R12 ODC, OFR Scanning implementation
projects.description:
Lend Lease is company specialized in project management and construction, real estate investment and development. Within Australia, Lend Lease is live with the Oracle scanning solution (ODC and OFR) in combination with Oracle R12 payables. In production they were facing major problems and therefore decided to temporally stop using the solution.
Jeroen was in his role as subject matter expert responsible for sharing his knowledge on Oracle ODC, OFR and R12 AP to help the client in solving the problems and getting it tested as soon as possible. Jeroen helped in identifying and solving the issues. He also set up a test  framework with test reporting required to execute and monitor test progress and helped in identifying the right test data for the test scripts.
The client was very happy with the effort Jeroen put in and the results realized. Jeroen was praised for his knowledgeable expertise and skills to explain complex issues in an understandable format.

projects.title: Ministry of Foreign Affairs - Advice eBS 11i support 2016
projects.description:
The Ministry of Foreign Affairs is currently running an 11.5.10 environment which is going out of extended support in November 2013. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs has decided that they want to extend the use of it until the end of 2016. Capgemini is handling the support for this environment.

Capgemini has been asked to do a research of what the impact and consequences would be to keep the Oracle 11i environment  up and running until the end of 2016. For the Ministry of Foreign Affairs this is a strategical application. Therefore the research is of great importance and is forming a basis for making strategical decisions on how to move forward with it. 

Jeroen was in his role as advisor responsible for doing the investigation for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs. He is checking what the current situation is for the several components involved, which are for example: Oracle eBS, Discoverer, Database, Java, OS, Hardware, MS Windows and MS IE.

Based on that they are determining where risks occur and what actions need to be taken to reduce the risks. They are describing several scenarios for the next coming years including what cost and contract implications are involved.

The final result is an advice to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of what actions should be taken in the short and long term to keep the application up and running in a secure way. This is forming a roadmap which helps the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to make the right decisions.

projects.title: KPN IT NL - SUEZ follow up release
projects.description:
After the Go live of the SUEZ R12 implementation at KPN, KPN wanted to do some more enhancements on their R12 EBS instance. 

Jeroen was in his role as lead application consultant responsible for the current innovation releases at KPN. As lead consultant Jeroen is responsible for delivering the current release on time and within budget for KPN. Jeroen is leading the Capgemini team which does the design, build, test and implementation for the several release items. 

Furthermore he is also the key contact person for the KPN business such as the KPN IT department. They were in the middle of a transition towards their new IT partner IBM. Jeroen is connecting with both KPN IT and IBM to make all arranges which are need for a successful implementation of the innovation release and to ensure a good handover towards the IBM maintenance team.

So Jeroen has been working together with Capgemini, KPN business, KPN IT and IBM and successfully delivered the innovation release project.

projects.title: Ministry of Foreign Affairs - Electronic Ordering & Invoicing Project
projects.description:
The goal of the EBF project was to digitalize all payments (invoices, expenses and program payments) for all departments within the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and all embassies worldwide. 

Capgemini has been chosen as implementation partner to deliver the EBF project. In the first two phases of the project all payments will be digitalized with the help of a scanning solution and by changing the approval flow within Oracle Payables. In the third phase a connection will be made to the Digipoort and integration with the DigiInkoop project will be realized. The project is being delivered with the ECM-IF methodology.

Because of his Oracle eInvoing & Payables expertise Jeroen has been asked as the Capgemini lead consultant for this project. 
Jeroen was in his role as lead consultant responsible for the content of the complete solution including the integration with other systems. Jeroen has been involved from the start of the implementation to guide BZ in workshops to shape the process and to design and determine the blueprint for the system. Among this was for instance a Proof of Concept for Oracle iExpense. Besides guiding the client Jeroen is also leading a team of implementation consultants from Capgemini within the Netherlands and is keeping in contact with the offshore team in India which is doing the development.

The project has gone live successfully.

projects.title: BZK - Rijksgebouwendienst - ENF Conversion
projects.description:
The Rijksgebouwendienst (RGD) is implementing a new Oracle eBS R12 platform with the project ‘een nieuw fundament’ (ENF) to maintain all their buildings, (rental) contracts, projects, maintenance and financial administration.

Capgemini has been asked to do the data conversion from the several source systems, which includes Oracle eBS R11 and other legacy systems, to the new R12 instance.

Jeroen was in his role as designer responsible for setting up a framework and design to do the conversion for the procure to pay parts of the conversion.

projects.title: KPN IT NL - Oracle R12 implementation (SUEZ)
projects.description:
Jeroen Sprangers was employed within KPN on the SUEZ project from the beginning until the end. This project is an Oracle R12 reimplementation. KPN is coming from an Oracle 11.5.10.2. version and with the reimplementation of Oracle R12 the goal is to use the new R12 functionalities, to drastically reduce the amount of customizations, by sticking to standard Oracle as much as possible, and to simplify the business processes. Because of the ambitious timeline and the size of the project this is a big challenge. The project also contains a strong offshore-component.
Jeroen was in his role as Supply consultant responsible for the modules HRMS, Payables, Payments, AME and APRO Imaging. He was part of the Supply team which designs and setups the solution of the R12 application. Within the Supply team Jeroen was a member of the Source to Pay Stream. This stream was occupied with all topics around the modules iSupplier Portal, Purchasing, iProcurement, Procurement Contracts, AME, Inventory, WIP, BOM, HRMS, Payables and Payments.
Jeroen is occupied with, the future design of the R12 solution, including validation of this with the business, the setup of Oracle, determining the customizations needed and the migration of 11 to 12.
The project has gone successfully live.

projects.title: KPN IT NL - Trading Platform
projects.description:
KPN has decided to optimize the P2P processes by sending out purchase orders and receiving invoices digitally in the Oracle eBusiness Suite (eBS) system. The model that they are using for this is by using a third party as a hub in middle. All purchase orders are send to the hub which distributes it to the supplier. The supplier’s sends an invoice back to the hub which processes it and send a XML Invoice message back to KPN.

This form of eOrdering and eInvoicing with XML messages will bring a cost reduction and efficiency to the Purchase and Payables process of KPN.

Jeroen was in his role as Oracle lead consultant responsible for the Payables part within the SUEZ project of KPN. Because of this and his eInvoicing knowledge Jeroen was asked as the expert for Payables and Invoicing in this project. From his expert knowledge he was responsible for designing and implementing the eInvoicing part of the solution. 

The complete solution has been developed and tested and is successful implemented into production together with the release of the SUEZ project in which this now has been incorporated.

publications.name: Integrated Analytics and Collaboration will change the future for Procurement

profile_positions.description:
Wij zijn Zelfstroom, het duurzame energiebedrijf met een duidelijke missie. Ons doel is om de aarde schoner door te geven aan de volgende generaties. Daarom kan je bij ons zonnepanelen kopen of huren en komt ons eigen installatieteam ze ook installeren. Op deze manier bedienen wij de klant van A tot Z.

Sinds 2018 mogen wij ons officieel met trots een B Corp gecertificeerd bedrijf noemen. Dat betekent dat wij een bijzondere impact hebben op het milieu, transparantie en corporate governance.

Wij hebben het keurmerk “Beste Werkgever 2019-2020” ontvangen binnen de branchesector Energie, Water en Telecom. Wij houden ervan om de lijnen kort te houden. Dus als je direct impact wilt maken, dan ontmoeten wij je graag!
profile_positions.title: Senior ERP Specialist

profile_positions.description:
Jeroen Sprangers is the lead of the Center of Excellence (CoE) ERP. The CoE ERP is the knowledge center which is responsible for gaining, spreading and preserving all knowledge and solutions concerning the different ERP solutions which Capgemini offers.

In his role as lead Jeroen is responsible for all the CoE activities. It is his job to take make sure that the different ERP groups work as one and to accomplish synergy by working together on the ERP fields of work. Among others he is occupied with knowledge sharing, innovation, business development, RFP’s, partner relations, the overall coordination and spreading the message of the “thought leadership” around ERP.
profile_positions.title: Center of Excellence Lead ERP

profile_positions.description:
After successfully completion of his study Computer science Jeroen became an employee of Capgemini. 

In his first years he worked on several Oracle E-Business Suite implementations. During this variety of projects he built up a broad level of knowledge and gained a lot of experience in working in complex international environments and leading others. 

Over time he specialized in the procurement Oracle ERP cloud & Unit4 ERP solutions. He is helping and advising companies with their questions on ERP and Cloud.

Furthermore he is also the Center of Excellence Lead for ERP in which he leads a group of ERP professionals and determines which knowledge is important to keep and gain.
profile_positions.title: Managing Enterprise Applications Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Within Capgemini Jeroen Sprangers is the Oracle Cloud ERP and eBS Center of Excellence (CoE) Lead. The CoE lead is there to make sure the right knowledge on Oracle Cloud ERP and eBS is gained, spread and preserved within the Package Based Solution community.

This is done by actively sharing the knowledge by for instance organizing events and writing whitepapers. The CoE lead also determines which knowledge is important to gain for the community and he also keeps track of the current knowledge within the community. He also takes care of references, standards and re-usables.

Finally the CoE lead is involved in the sales cycle. For example by creating Service Offerings and involvement in presales. He also takes care of the external orientation of the “thought leadership” of Capgemini on this topic with for instance the help of Social media.
profile_positions.title: Oracle Cloud ERP and eBS Center of Excellence Lead

profile_positions.description:
Jeroen Sprangers did his final internship with Imtech – Systems in ’s Hertogenbosch. Imtech – Systems is a company which is a system integrator for analyzer, metering, validation and desuperheater solutions for customers in the oil, gas & process industry. 

He did this internship together with another student. The assignment consisted of the investigating, testing and developing of the possibilities of building project management reports with information from an ERP package.

The result was a scalable management reporting tool which provided an improvement of the information supply.
profile_positions.title: Final internship
